| {{SVGRef}}{{Deprecated_Header}} > |

The ideographic attribute indicates the alignment coordinate for {{Glossary("glyphs")}} to achieve ideographic {{Glossary("baseline/typography", "baseline")}} alignment for horizontally oriented glyph layouts. The value is an offset in the font coordinate system.

^ |

You can use this attribute with the following SVG elements:

|

title: ideographic
summary: The ideographic attribute indicates the alignment coordinate for glyphs to achieve ideographic baseline alignment for horizontally oriented glyph layouts. The value is an offset in the font coordinate system.
pageTitle: ideographic - SVG: Scalable Vector Graphics | MDN
